name: Democracy - OWID based on Episodes of Regime Transformation (v13)
title: Democracy - OWID based on Episodes of Regime Transformation (v13)
description:
This dataset provides information on political regimes, using data from the Episodes of Regime Transformation project (v13).

We slightly adapt their classification. You can download the code and complete dataset, including supplementary variables, from GitHub: https://github.com/owid/notebooks/tree/main/BastianHerre/political_regimes

sources.name: Episodes of Regime Transformation (v13)
sources.additionalInfo:
This dataset provides information on political regimes, using data from the Episodes of Regime Transformation project (v13).

We slightly adapt their classification. You can download the code and complete dataset, including supplementary variables, from GitHub: https://github.com/owid/notebooks/tree/main/BastianHerre/political_regimes
sources.dataPublishedBy: Our World in Data, Bastian Herre
sources.dataPublisherSource: Data comes from the Episodes of Regime Transformation project (v13).

resources.path: Democracy - OWID based on Episodes of Regime Transformation (v13).csv

fields.name: regime_dich_ert
fields.description: The variable identifies the political regime of a country using the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project. It distinguishes between autocracies (score 0) and democracies (score 1).

fields.name: regime_ert
fields.description: The variable identifies the political regime of a country using the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project. It distinguishes between hardening autocracies (score 0), stable autocracies (score 1), liberalizing autocracies (score 2), eroding democracies (score 3), stable democracies (score 4), and deepening democracies (score 5).

fields.name: regime_trep_outcome_ert
fields.description: The variable identifies the regime transformation episode outcome of a country using the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project. It distinguishes between hardened autocracies (score 0), reverted autocratic liberalizations (score 1), liberalized autocracies (score 2), preempted democratizations (score 3), democratizations (score 4), democratic breakdowns (score 5), preempted democratic breakdowns (score 6), diminished democracies (score 7), averted democratic erosion (score 8), deepened democracies (score 9), still ongoing autocratization episodes (score 10), and still ongoing democratization episodes (score 11).

fields.name: number_hardaut_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of hardening autocracies based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.

fields.name: number_staut_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of stable autocracies based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.

fields.name: number_libaut_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of liberalizing autocracies based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.

fields.name: number_erodem_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of eroding democracies based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.

fields.name: number_stdem_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of stable democracies based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.

fields.name: number_deepdem_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of deepening democracies based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.

fields.name: pop_hardaut_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of people living in hardening autocracies based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.

fields.name: pop_staut_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of people living in stable autocracies based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.

fields.name: pop_libaut_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of people living in liberalizing autocracies based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.

fields.name: pop_erodem_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of people living in eroding democracies based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.

fields.name: pop_stdem_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of people living in stable democracies based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.

fields.name: pop_deepdem_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of people living in deepening democracies based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.

fields.name: pop_missreg_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of people living in countries with missing regime type based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.

fields.name: regime_trich_ert
fields.description: The variable identifies the political regime of a country using the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project. It distinguishes between autocratizing regimes (score 0), stable regimes (score 1), and democratizing regimes (score 2).

fields.name: number_autreg_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of autocratizing regimes based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.

fields.name: number_streg_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of stable regimes based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.

fields.name: number_demreg_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of democratizing regimes based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.

fields.name: pop_autreg_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of people living in autocratizing regimes based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.

fields.name: pop_streg_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of people living in stable regimes based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.

fields.name: pop_demreg_ert
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of people living in democratizing regimes based on the classification by the Episodes of Regime Transformation-project.
